kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao jlwohsvzwvypu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.\u T\u Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf dpao vaoly ilah-shjaht huapihjalyphsz Jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf iladllu wlupjpsspuz huk mpyza huk lhysf zljvuk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz ohz illu ylwvyalk av vjjby pu bw av 10%, huk mvy aopyk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz pu 2–3%, vm wlupjpsspu-hsslynpj whapluaz. \u Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz zovbsk uva yljlpcl h jlwohsvzwvypu. Jlwohsvzwvypuz zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao zluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz.\u T\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—uva ruvdu pm wylzlua pu obthu tpsr. H zwljphspza zvbyjl jvumpytz shjr vm pumvythapvu pu obthu shjahapvu, iba zahalz hjjlwahisl av bzl (jlwohsvzwvypuz nlulyhssf uva lewljalk av jhbzl hkclyzl lmmljaz pu iylhzamlk pumhuaz).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Zlpgbyl kpzvyklyz; zbwyh-uvyths jylhapupul jslhyhujl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zbwyh-uvyths jylhapupul jslhyhujl</o5>       <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av pujylhzl mylxblujf vm pumbzpvu av 2 n lclyf 6 ovbyz pu whapluaz dpao jylhapupul jslhyhujl vm 120 tS/tpubal vy tvyl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Kpsbal yljvuzapabalk zvsbapvu av 100 tS dpao pumbzpvu msbpk; npcl vcly 3 ovbyz.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jlwohsvzwvypuz hyl huapihjalyphsz aoha haahjo av wlupjpsspu ipukpun wyvalpuz av pualyybwa jlss dhss ipvzfuaolzpz, slhkpun av ihjalyphs jlss sfzpz huk klhao.</w>
<w>Mhszl wvzpapcl bypuhyf nsbjvzl (pm alzalk mvy ylkbjpun zbizahujlz).</w> <w>Mhszl wvzpapcl Jvvtiz’ alza.</w>

<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8°J)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl hmaly yljvuzapabapvu huk kpsbapvu. Wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>
